column3: Greetings. I'm conducting a recall of spectacles formerly classified as headgear. I shall be happy to exchange any such items in your possession for a new, more convenient model.
Spectacles registered as fashion accessories will be exchanged for the equivalent facewear item.
Ah. It would seem you don't have any spectacles of the sort I'm recalling. If you happen to obtain a pair, please do bring them to me.
Ah. It would seem you have already exchanged all your spectacles. Thank you for your cooperation.
